findings.title:
Credential in plaintext?

Rule: Env Var
Line:   -d '{"secretKey": "YOUR_PRIVATE_API_KEY", "requestId": "YOUR_REQUEST_ID"}'

Commit: .
findings.description:
The application stores sensitive information in cleartext within a resource that might be accessible to another control sphere.

## Additional information

**[Env Var](https://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/312.html)**

findings.title: In most cases using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method. This may result in a performance penalty.
